title: Mummy Tag of Plenis
description:
Wooden mummy ticket. Notched on both sides at top and pierced at center top. Painted lettering of six lines in Greek. Letters partially erased and surface worn on left side. Back plain. 
Inscription reads: "Plenis, the younger son of Marinas. He lived 35 years."
inscribed: Plenis the younger son of Marinas. He lived 35 years.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
